Package Server

Class SessionHandler

java.lang.Object
Server.SessionHandler
public class SessionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
A class which deals with the user authentication and ensuring that only valid sessions are able to execute queries.

      public SessionHandler()

  • Method Details

    • newSession

      public java.lang.String newSession​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.Integer unitId)
      Generates a random session ID that expires after 24 hours.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to authenticate.
      unitId - The unitId of the user being logged into.
      Returns:
      Session token.

    • validateSession

      public java.lang.String validateSession​(java.lang.String sessionToken)
      Validates whether a session ID belongs to a user. If it does, the username of the current user is returned. If not valid, returns null.
      Parameters:
      sessionToken - The session token to validate.
      Returns:
      The username of the session.

    • deleteSession

      public void deleteSession​(java.lang.String sessionToken)
      Removes the specified session token.
      Parameters:
      sessionToken - The Session Token to delete.

    • addUpdateLog

      public void addUpdateLog​(int organisationalUnitId, java.lang.String yourAction, java.lang.String otherUnitName, java.lang.String assetName, int credits, int quantity)
      Adds an update to the updates log for the current session.
      Parameters:
      organisationalUnitId - unitId of the users to notify.
      yourAction - Action being performed "SOLD" or "BOUGHT".
      otherUnitName - Name of the other unit that made the purchase.
      assetName - Name of the asset that was purchased.
      credits - Amount of credits that it was purchased for.
      quantity - Quantity purchased.

    • getUpdateLog

      public java.util.HashMap<java.time.LocalDateTime,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> getUpdateLog​(java.lang.String sessionId)
      Gets the update logs for a session id.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Session ID to get the logs for.
      Returns:
      A HashMap of Purchase DateTime, and updates as HashMap (String, Object).
